posts.post_content:
Im looking for these if anyone has lower end cards to sell. thanks
i need any 2 to complete a project...

Red Kleinow (catching Boston version)
Bill Carrigan
Ed Cicotte
Tris Speaker (no condition too bad:D)

I have a Carrigan with a good front [no obvious creases], bad back [about half paper-loss due to scrapbook pasting] for $16, delivered.
Shoot me an email if you're interested and I'll send you a scan.
That will probably work for my purposes. pm sent, thanks

I have a Kleinow here:
[URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/tobacco.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/tobacco.html[/URL]

And a Speaker here: [URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html[/URL]
I just got my last player from this set...it took me about 6 months, i now have either all SGC graded or raw (to be sent to SGC).
